description.help: Show the help menu for all commands
description.counting: Set or cancel the counting channel
description.output_chat_history: Output the chat history of a channel to a file
description.chat_hugging: Chat with a model from Hugging Face
description.join_leave_message: Set the channel to send a message when a user joins or leaves the server.
description.delete_spam_messages: Delete messages sent by a specific user within a specific time frame
description.keep: Have the bot remind you at a specified time
description.rank: Check your chat rank in this server
description.levels: View the chat rank leaderboard for this server
description.repeat: Make the bot repeat what you say
description.where_am_i: Tells you which server and channel you are in
description.get_system_channel: Get the system channel for this server
description.server_info: Show detailed information about this server
description.convert_timestamp: Convert a Unix timestamp to a readable time format
description.tw_high_school_score_calculator: Calculate the total score for the Taiwanese high school entrance exam
description.random_number: Generate a random number within a specified range
description.suggest: Send a suggestion to the developer
description.report: Report a bug to the developer
description.world_chat: Set the current channel as a world chat channel
description.report_bad_image: Report a user who sent an inappropriate image in the world chat
description.youtube_notification: Set or cancel update notifications for a specific YouTube channel
description.add: Add a song to the playlist
description.back: Go back to the previous song
description.stop: Stop playing and leave the channel
description.remove: Remove a song from the playlist
description.cat_fact: Get a random fact about cats
description.nasa: Get the NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day
description.number_history: Query historical facts about a number
description.minecraft_server_status: Get the status of a Minecraft server
description.toxic_jacket_soup: Get a toxic chicken soup for the soul quote
description.yt_downloader: Download a video or audio via yt-dlp
description.lang: Set your preferred language. (Only using the prefix (prefix command, i.e., [) will take effect)
description.del_keep: Delete an event you previously created with /keep
description.sub_yt: Subscribe to a YouTuber in the current Discord channel, notifications will be sent here
description.sub_yt_cancel: Cancel a YouTuber subscription in the current Discord channel
description.sub_yt_list: List all YouTubers subscribed to in the current Discord channel
description.set_ai_channel: Set this channel as an AI channel to have the AI automatically reply to messages
description.cancel_ai_channel: Cancel the AI channel setting for this channel
description.change_ai_channel_model: Change the model for this AI channel
description.change_ai_channel_system_prompt: Change the system prompt for this AI channel
description.show_ai_channel_model: Show the currently used model for this AI channel
description.chat: Have a conversation with the AI
description.set_chat_human: Set this channel as a chat_human conversation channel
description.cancel_chat_human: Cancel the chat_human conversation setting for this channel
description.bot_stats: Show bot statistics, including but not limited to uptime, number of starts, command calls...
description.show_keep: List all notes you've created using /remind

params_desc.keep_time: Enter when you want YinXi to remind you, AI will be used to determine the time
params_desc.translate_content: Enter the text you want to translate
params_desc.translate_target: Select the target language (default is zh-TW)
params_desc.help_cog_name: The name of the command category to query
params_desc.help_cmd_name: The name of the command to query
params_desc.output_chat_history_reverse: Whether to reverse the message order (default no)
params_desc.chat_hugging_prompt: What would you like to say to the AI?
params_desc.chat_hugging_history: Select a history to continue the conversation
params_desc.chat_hugging_show_thoughts: Whether to show the AI's thought process (only visible to you)
params_desc.join_leave_message_join_channel: Channel to send a message when a user joins
params_desc.join_leave_message_leave_channel: Channel to send a message when a user leaves
params_desc.delete_spam_messages_hours: How many hours ago to delete messages
params_desc.delete_spam_messages_user: The user whose messages to delete
params_desc.keep_event: The event to be reminded of
params_desc.repeat_text: The text for the bot to repeat
params_desc.avatar_member: The user to get the avatar of (can be left blank)
params_desc.tw_high_school_score_calculator_image: Upload your report card image for AI recognition
params_desc.tw_high_school_score_calculator_prompt: What do you want the AI to help you with (only used if you upload an image)
params_desc.random_number_start: The starting number of the random range
params_desc.random_number_end: The ending number of the random range
params_desc.random_number_times: How many random numbers to generate (default 1)
params_desc.play_query: Enter a song name, YouTube link, or playlist
params_desc.add_query: Enter the name of the song or YouTube link to add
params_desc.remove_number: The number of the song to remove (viewable from /queue)
params_desc.lyrics_lrc: Whether to show lyrics with a timeline (default no)
params_desc.volume_volume: Set the volume (0-200), or use the buttons to fine-tune
params_desc.world_chat_cancel: Whether to cancel the world chat setting
params_desc.report_bad_image_author: The username of the user who sent the inappropriate image
params_desc.youtube_notification_youtuber: The YouTube channel link to set notifications for (leave blank to cancel)
params_desc.news_options: Choose to query 'all news' or 'top headlines'
params_desc.news_question: Keyword to search for (only effective when 'all news' is selected)
params_desc.news_language: Language of the news (default is Chinese)
params_desc.news_country: Country to query for top headlines (only effective when 'top headlines' is selected)
params_desc.news_count: Number of news articles to output (default is 3)
params_desc.number_history_number: Enter a number to query its story
params_desc.unsplash_image_query: Image keyword to search for (random if left blank)
params_desc.unsplash_image_num: Number of images to retrieve (only effective when a keyword is entered)
params_desc.get_gifs_query: GIF keyword to search for (random if left blank)
params_desc.get_gifs_num: Number of GIFs to retrieve (only effective when a keyword is entered)
params_desc.get_gifs_lang: Language of the GIF (only effective when a keyword is entered)
params_desc.yt_downloader_url: Enter the URL of the video/audio
params_desc.yt_downloader_quality: Select the video quality (only effective when mp4 is selected)
params_desc.sub_yt_url: Enter the YouTuber link to subscribe to here (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/@KeJC130)
params_desc.qrcode_scanner_image: Upload a QR code image here
params_desc.chat_is_vision_model: Is this an image model (if you have uploaded an image, please set this to True)
params_desc.set_ai_channel_model: AI model to set, default is qwen-3-32b

components.send_keep_time_passed: {}, the time you specified has already passed, please choose a future time.
components.send_keep_too_far: You set a time 1000 years in the future?? I won't even be alive then, how dare you :sob:

field.name: Note:
field.value:
1. Remember to enable mention notifications for this channel so you don't miss any reminders!
2. The 'only you can see these' feature cannot be used when sending notifications (they will be visible when you are reminded QAQ)

components.send_bot_info_help_view_error: An error occurred during this operation: "{e}", please report it to the developer.
components.send_bot_info_help_more_commands_cannot_: There are other commands from {value} that cannot be displayed

fields.name: **{command_name}**
fields.value: {command_description}

fields.name: ü§ñ **Name**
fields.value: YinXi

fields.name: üë® **Author**
fields.value: KeKe KeJC

fields.name: ‚öôÔ∏è **Known Command Categories**
fields.value: {cogs_list}

fields.name: üêô **My Github Link**
fields.value: [NotKeKe](https://github.com/NotKeKe)

fields.name: üîó **This Project Link**
fields.value: [YinXi](https://github.com/NotKeKe/Discord-Bot-YinXi)

fields.name: **Features**
fields.value:
> ‚úÖ Discord Bot integrated with AI
> ‚úÖ Has music features, including looping!
> ‚úÖ Provides many useful small features
> ‚úÖ Most commands can be directly called using `[` instead of being limited to slash commands

fields.name: **üåü AI Features**
fields.value:
> `/chat` - Chat with AI
> `/ai_channel` - Set up an AI channel, chat without entering commands
> `/image_generation` - Generate images with AI (cogview-3-flash)
> You can also chat by DMing YinXi!

fields.name: **üë• Server Features**
fields.value:
> `/server_info` - Quickly get important information about this server
> `/world_chat` - Communicate with other users who have this feature enabled across servers
> `/counting_channel` - Play a number relay game with server members
> `/get_system_channel` - As the name suggests
> `/avatar` - Take someone's avatar when they're not looking w

fields.name: **üé∂ Music Features**
fields.value:
> `/play` or `[p` `{query}` - Play a song ‚ñ∂Ô∏è
> `/add` `{query}` - Add a song to the playlist ‚ûï
> `/skip` or `[s` - Skip the current song ‚è≠Ô∏è
> `/back` - Go back to the previous song ‚èÆÔ∏è
> `/pause` or `[ps` or `[Êö´ÂÅú` - Pause the music ‚è∏Ô∏è
> `/resume` or `[rs` - Resume the music ‚ñ∂Ô∏è
> `/stop` - Clear the playlist and leave the channel ‚èπÔ∏è
> `/loop {loop_type}` - Set the loop mode üîÅ
> `/current_playing` or `[np` or `[now` - Show the currently playing song ‚ÑπÔ∏è
> `/list` or `[q` - Show the playlist üìã
> `/delete_song` or `[rm` `{number}` - Delete a song from the playlist ‚ùå
> `/clear_queue` or `[clear` - Clear the entire playlist üßπ
> `/leave` - Leave the voice channel üö™
> **Some commands have other ways to be called, be sure to try them out~**

fields.name: **üîß Useful Gadgets**
fields.value:
> `/minecraft_server_status` - Check the status of a Minecraft server
> `[nasa` - Get the daily image provided by NASA
> `[cat` - Get daily cat knowledge üê±
> `[image {query} {number}` - Enter the keyword you want to search for and the number of images to search for, and you'll get the images you want (you can also leave it blank!)
> `[gif` - Use `/gif` to see how to use it~
> `[simp` - Say something a simp would say üê∂üê∂üê∂ **~~(but the official says it's a jerk quote)~~**
> `/qrcode_generator` - Convert a link to a QR Code
> `/remind` - Reminder function! After you set it up, it will remind you of what you need to do in the same channel when the time comes
> `/subscribe_youtube` - Notifies you when a YouTuber you follow has updated! (If you don't enter anything in the youtuber field, it will be cancelled)
> `/output_chat_history` - Output channel chat history (can be output as a `json` or `txt` file)

fields.name: **ü§´ Features most people won't use**
fields.value: > `/convert_timestamp` - Convert a timestamp to a readable time

fields.name: Other:
fields.value: > There are more features waiting for you to discover!
